markscheme-components.a:
The first error is in step 2: −3x − 2x = −5x, not −x as given.

Marking guidelines (2 marks):

markscheme-components.b:
[x² + 4x + x + 4 = x² − 3x − 2x + 6]
x² + 5x + 4 = x² − 5x + 6
5x + 4 = −5x + 6
10x + 4 = 6
10x = 2
x = 1/5

Marking guidelines (2 marks):
• M1 for an attempt to correct the solution in line with their answer to (a)
